titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals to defer tax on income reinvested in a partnership or S corporation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/6/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers an exclusion from gross income for certain items of partnership and S corporation pass-thru income up to $250,000 ($500,000 for married couples filing joint returns).
